title: Abandoned Lady Awakened in the Dungeon – Sacred Mark? A True Saint? No I Am Just a Monster Foodie! - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Chefs   Cooking   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   Monsters   Mythology   Nobles   Royalty   Saints   Tomboyish Female Lead   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Asazuki Asa   朝月アサ
description:
Marquess Lysette was robbed of her saintly power as well as her fiance by her sister.

She has also been stripped of her title for a crime she did not commit, and she is now abandoned in the dungeon.

It was practically a death sentence, but with the initial skill【Noble-Bloodline】, the skill points she gained were tripled, and she was able to solo through the dungeon quickly and easily with the skills 【Total-Attack Magic】 and 【Preemptive-Action】.

But the food problem stood in Lysette’s way.

“… I wonder if monsters can be eaten… H-How delicious! Alright! From now on, I’ll just enjoy the dungeon’s blessings!”

Lysette loves her life in the dungeon, where she cooks monster dishes for the adventurers she meets.

Meanwhile, her sister, Saint, was experiencing a mysterious weakening of her powers.>
